mapper.select: SELECT sm.`id`, sm.`logo_addr`, sm.`store_name`, sm.`sub_store_name`, sm.`area_address`, sm.`store_address`, sm.sys_user_id FROM marketing_gift_bag_store mgbs LEFT JOIN store_manage sm ON mgbs.`sys_user_id` = sm.`sys_user_id` WHERE mgbs.`del_flag` = 0 AND sm.`del_flag` = 0 AND mgbs.marketing_gift_bag_id = #{marketingGiftBagId}
